Title: Enacts "Cesar's law" to require the retaking of parolees who abscond from the supervision of the state board of parole
Summary: Enacts "Cesar's law" to require the retaking of parolees who abscond from the supervision of the state board of parole.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the retaking of certain persons absconding from parole or other conditional release
